about_the_game:
Welcome to Population Quiz, the ultimate test of your global knowledge! Do you have what it takes to guess which country or region has a larger population? Put your skills to the test in this fun and educational game that will challenge your understanding of the world's demographics. 🌎

Gameplay:

  • Simple Mechanics: Each round presents you with two options – two countries or regions. Your task is to choose the one with the larger population. Sounds easy? Think again!

  • Features:

  • Enhance your geographical knowledge while having fun.

  • Beautiful Interface: Enjoy a visually appealing and user-friendly interface that makes playing a breeze.

  • Nice soundtrack

Are you ready to test your knowledge and learn more about the world's population?

( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡° )

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: A recent Linux distribution (e.g., Ubuntu 18.04 or later, Fedora 30 or later)
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU (e.g., Intel Core i3 or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (e.g., Intel HD Graphics or equivalent)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Sierra (10.12) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or Apple M1 chip
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (e.g., Intel UHD Graphics or Apple GPU)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
